resources.string: It is necessary to access the phone data to start the application
The device version is not compatible with the application

The device information is: 

 Phone number: 
 %1$s 
 Connection type: %2$s 
 Data Status: %3$s 
 IMEI: %4$s 
 SIM serial number: 
 %5$s 
 SIM operator: 
 %6$s, %7$s 
 Network operator: 
 %8$s, %9$s 
 ISO Country SIM code: 
 %10$s 
 ISO code Country Network: 
 %11$s 
 Answering machine number: 
 %12$s 
 Roaming enabled: %13$s 
 IMSI: 
 %14$s 
 IMEI Version: 
 %15$s 
 Cell info: 

 %16$s
